translation.en: [ Man ] I'm gonna talk to Parker about my promotion today.
translation.fr: Je vais parler à Parker de ma promotion.

translation.en: And the worst-case scenario,
you're two weeks ahead of me, you get a gorgeous little apartment in the Marais.
translation.fr: tu pars avant et tu nous trouves un appart dans le Marais.

translation.en: What if I don't want to live in the Marais?
translation.fr: Et si j'aime pas le Marais ?

translation.en: [ Man ] We could live somewhere else then.
We could go to Detroit.
- Detroit? - Yeah, you could meet my mom and dad.
translation.fr: A Détroit ? Tu rencontrerais mes parents.

translation.en: You can meet my sister. She owns a bakery.
translation.fr: Et ma sœur. Elle a une boulangerie.

translation.en: - And she will make you fat. - [ Laughs ]
I have six hours before I have to go back to the hospital.
translation.fr: Il me reste 6 heures avant de retourner à l'hôpital.

translation.en: You wanna go back into bed with me?
[ Beeping ] I do.
But I got back-to-back meetings all morning.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai des rendez-vous ce matin.

translation.en: Too bad for you.
[ Beeping ] Yeah, I know. But I gotta get in.
translation.fr: Je sais... Mais je dois y aller,

translation.en: There's probably already 25 people lined up outside the door, waiting.
translation.fr: ils doivent déjà faire la queue dehors.

translation.en: I love when you speak French.
[ Woman ]nging ] SATCOM check.
Echo Nine Three Victor Echo Two.
[ Man ] Ops Center.
This is safe house seven-R. We're open for business.
Confirmed.
Any reservations?
Nothing in the registry.
Walk-ins? Not expected.
translation.fr: Du passage ? Rien de prévu. Reconfirmez dans 3h.

translation.en: Reconfirm in three hours.
Understood.
THURSDAY, 1:53 PM [ Hands Tapping Table ]
[ Man ] Matt. Your cell. Really?
translation.fr: Matt, tu appelles de ton portable ?

translation.en: Relax. I've got an encryption packet.
translation.fr: Détends-toi, j'ai une clé de cryptage.

translation.en: Well, you know me. I never relax.
translation.fr: Tu sais que je ne me détends jamais.

translation.en: Watch the cholesterol, old man.
You sound like Miriam.
So, what's new in Cape Town? Nothing, nothing.
translation.fr: Quoi de neuf, au Cap ? Rien. J'ai mis à jour et renvoyé

translation.en: I updated my Surveillance Target Analysis. It's complete now.
translation.fr: Rien. J'ai mis à jour et renvoyé mon analyse de site.

translation.en: Yeah, that's an exit report. It's not due till you leave.
translation.fr: On fait ça quand on quitte son poste.

translation.en: Exactly. Exactly. And when-- when is that?
How long has it been?
Twelve months. Well, talk to me in another four.
Je-- David, I'm-- I'm dying here.
What's happening with the post in Paris?
One slot and 37 applicants.
Every one of them with more field experience than you.
translation.fr: qui ont plus d'expérience que toi.

translation.en: Okay, how am I supposed to get more experience? I'm staring at four walls all day.
translation.fr: Comment je peux acquérir de l'expérience entre 4 murs ?

translation.en: I got passed up on Rome, then Berlin.
translation.fr: J'ai pas eu Rome alors que mon évaluation était excellente.

translation.en: You said yourself my evaluation was excellent.
translation.fr: alors que mon évaluation était excellente.

translation.en: Just put it in front of Whitford.
I know he'll see that I'm ready to go, I'm all in.
translation.fr: il verra que je suis prêt, au point.

translation.en: Matt, I know this has been hard, but it's the way the system works.
translation.fr: Matt, je sais que c'est dur, mais c'est comme ça.

translation.en: Look, I'll talk to Whitford about Paris, but I can't promise anything.
translation.fr: Je parlerai à Whitford pour Paris, mais je ne promets rien.

translation.en: Look, I gotta go.
Don't worry. I'm looking after you, okay?
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas, je m'occupe de toi.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. I know.
[ Man ] This is not a negotiation.
It's 10 million.
You'll get the file, and if the money is not in the account by 3:00 p.m.,
translation.fr: Vous aurez le fichier. Faites le virement avant 15h,

translation.en: I'll take it to another buyer.
translation.fr: ou je trouve un autre acheteur.

translation.en: [ Man #2 ] How do we know that you won't do that anyway?
translation.fr: Qui me dit que vous ne le ferez pas ?

translation.en: You don't.
Here you are, sir.
Petrus.
- You look good. - I do, don't I?
translation.fr: Tu as bonne mine. Tu trouves aussi ?

translation.en: So, how are things at MI6? The usual.
Same bureaucratic bullshit and appalling remuneration.
translation.fr: Toujours pareil. Bureaucratie et rémunération affligeante.

translation.en: Life of a government man. Mm-hmm.
So--
The original file. Dates, transactions, names.
translation.fr: Le fichier d'origine. Dates, transactions, noms.

translation.en: A bargain at triple the price.
Take a look.
I've been waiting a long time for this.
Tobin. What's in that box...
is gonna make the world a smaller place for you-- for both of us.
translation.fr: Ceci va rendre le monde très petit pour toi, pour nous.

translation.en: I got your account. You get your cut 24 hours after transaction.
translation.fr: Je ferai virer ta part 24h après la transaction.

translation.en: Some of our old bosses aren't going to be happy these files are out in the open.
translation.fr: Nos anciens patrons ne vont pas aimer ça.

translation.en: Do I make you nervous?
Always.
Good.
You want her?
Please listen to me.
I had nothing to do with this.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien à voir avec ça.

translation.en: Stop.
[ Sirens Wailing ] Let's go.
Tobin, you have to believe me.
I knew nothing about any of that.
Did you know if anybody was following you? No.
translation.fr: Tu sais si tu as été suivi ?

translation.en: I don't think anybody was following me.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas avoir été suivi.

translation.en: I swear on my life, Tobin, I had absolutely-- [ Gunshot ]
translation.fr: Je te le jure sur ma vie, je n'avais...

translation.en: Slow down.
We go in by foot.
Head towards the square.
Move, move, move!
We're heading west. Holland Street. Move, move.
translation.fr: Direction ouest. Holland Street, on se bouge !

translation.en: My name is Tobin Frost.
C.I.A. HEADQUARTERS LANGELY, VIRGINIA
translation.fr: Q.G. DE LA C.I.A. LANGLEY, VIRGINIE

translation.en: Linklater.
When?
Lock down the consulate.
Get me a team in the situation room in five minutes. I want everything we got on Tobin Frost. [ Man ] Yes, ma'am.
translation.fr: En cellule de crise dans 5 minutes, je veux tout ce qu'on a sur Tobin Frost.

translation.en: Is it him? Yeah.
Whitford know? I'm on my way there now.
translation.fr: - Whitford le sait ? - Je vais lui dire.

translation.en: Sir, place your finger in there until I tell you to stop.
translation.fr: Posez le doigt ici jusqu'à mon signal.

translation.en: [ Beeping ] Thank you.
translation.fr: Posez le doigt ici jusqu'à mon signal. Merci.

translation.en: So how long has he been playing in your backyard?
We're working to get you that answer right now.
- Meaning you don't know. - No, meaning we're looking into it.
translation.fr: Vous ne le savez pas ? Nous cherchons à comprendre.

translation.en: The guy goes rogue. He spends nine years selling out the Agency to all takers.
translation.fr: Depuis 9 ans, il vend ses infos sur l'Agence à la Russie, la Chine, l'Iran, tout le monde.

translation.en: To Russia, China, Iran, you name it.
translation.fr: à la Russie, la Chine, l'Iran, tout le monde.

translation.en: Guy's just not gonna prance into an American consulate without good reason.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas entré dans un consulat sans une bonne raison.

translation.en: All right! Listen up. Everybody off the phone.
Tobin Frost has just waltzed his way into a U.S. consulate in Cape Town, South Africa.
translation.fr: Tobin Frost vient de débarquer dans le consulat américain du Cap.

translation.en: Now this man without question is one of the most notorious traitors that we've got.
translation.fr: C'est l'un de nos plus célèbres agents doubles.

translation.en: Errington, call up his background profile.
[ Errington ] Tobin Frost was recruited into the Agency in 1984.
translation.fr: Tobin Frost a été recruté par l'Agence en 1984,

translation.en: He tested off the charts in aptitude for psychological fieldwork.
His first assignment was in Lebanon in January 1985.
translation.fr: Première mission au Liban en janvier 1985.

translation.en: Three months later, he captured and flipped a high-ranking Hezbollah leader.
translation.fr: 3 mois plus tard, il a retourné un chef du Hezbollah.

translation.en: Over the next several years,
Frost successfully questioned and recruited many high-value individuals.
translation.fr: Frost a interrogé et recruté de nombreux agents éminents.

translation.en: He became known as an expert manipulator of human assets,
translation.fr: Il est expert en manipulation mentale

translation.en: and he literally rewrote Agency interrogation protocols.
translation.fr: et il a réécrit nos protocoles d'interrogatoire.

translation.en: Frost served in many active theaters, including Libya,
translation.fr: Frost a été affecté en Libye

translation.en: from 1995 to 1998, Jordan, '98 to 2000.
translation.fr: de 1995 à 1998, puis en Jordanie de 98 à 2000.

translation.en: During his tenure in Jordan, Frost was suspected of leaking information to Mossad,
translation.fr: Là, on l'a soupçonné d'informer le Mossad

translation.en: but nothing was confirmed.
Ten years ago, Frost went off the reservation completely.
translation.fr: Il y a 10 ans, il a pris le large.

translation.en: He currently has no allegiancs and is wanted for espionage on four continents.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas de camp et il est recherché pour espionnage sur 4 continents.

translation.en: His last known sighting is Hamburg, Germany in 2011.
translation.fr: Il a été vu pour la dernière fois à Hambourg en 2011.

translation.en: You know, Harlan, we should interrogate Frost now.
Sweat him for everything he's got.
Once he's stateside, we have fewer options.
translation.fr: Ici, on aurait les mains liées.

translation.en: I have an interrogator in Yemen. Can be there in eight hours.
translation.fr: Mon interrogateur y sera dans 8 heures.

translation.en: I already have a team in Jo'burg that can be there in two.
We'll take Frost to the safe house, interrogate him there. My people are fully capable of handling this.
translation.fr: Frost ira dans notre planque, mon équipe s'en charge.

translation.en: This is Tobin Frost.
We'll go with Jo'burg.
Housekeeping.
[ Man ] We have a last-minute reservation.
E.T.A. for check-in? Sometime tonight.
translation.fr: Heure d'arrivée prévue ? Dans la soirée. Freeark Assurances.

translation.en: Freeark Insurance. Got it.
translation.fr: Dans la soirée. Freeark Assurances. C'est noté.

translation.en: Hey, where are you?
Parker just handed me his oversight papers to finis.
translation.fr: Parker m'a donné sa paperasse à finir,

translation.en: And his daughter Chloe's got the measles. You believe that?
translation.fr: sa fille a la rougeole. T'y crois ?

translation.en: How long you gonna be out for? I don't know. I don't know.
translation.fr: Tu restes combien de temps ? J'en sais rien.

translation.en: Okay. Well, look, I'm gonna dive into this, and then, um, hopefully I can meet up with you later, okay?
translation.fr: Ecoute, je me mets au boulot et j'essaie de te retrouver plus tard.

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds good. Hey. Hey.
I love you. I love you too.
AIR FORCE BASE SWARTKOP JOHANNESBURG
Extraction team is in the air, sir.
They should be on the ground within the hour.
I want that team in and out of the city in less than 12 hours.
- We're not even supposed to have a presence in Cape Town. - [ Man ] Yes, sir.
translation.fr: on n'est pas censés être présents au Cap.

translation.en: [ Whitford ] Any communication about Frost's whereabouts...
translation.fr: Toute communication sur la position de Frost

translation.en: is strictly need to know.
Sir, the extraction team's en route to the consulate now.
translation.fr: L'équipe d'exfiltration se dirige vers le consulat.

translation.en: - Who's reaching out to seven-R? - Richards, ma'am.
I want the housekeeper briefed.
translation.fr: C'est Richards. Prévenez le gardien, l'antenne doit être coupée du monde.

translation.en: High-priority target is coming in. I want the house quiet.
translation.fr: Prévenez le gardien, l'antenne doit être coupée du monde.

translation.en: Under no circumstances should there be any communication until the team has left.
translation.fr: Aucune communication tant que l'équipe est là.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
5:37 AM, FRIDAY - [ Cell Phone Rings ] - [ Tires Squealing ]
Account? You have a room?
translation.fr: Vous avez une chambre ? - Quel nom ? - Daniel Kiefer.

translation.en: Daniel Kiefer, Freeark Insurance. K-I-E-F-E-R.
Freeark Insurance. K-I-E-F-E-R.
- [ Man ] You are a go. - [ Dial Tone ]
You're good to go.
Hey, I'm Weston. Guest room?
translation.fr: - Moi, c'est Weston. - Chambre de l'invité ?

translation.en: Uh, it's right around the corner. Two rights and a left.
translation.fr: Au bout, 2 fois à droite puis à gauche.

translation.en: All the way back.
That's Tobin Frost. [ Kiefer ] Stay with him.
translation.fr: C'est Tobin Frost. Restez avec lui.

translation.en: Let's go download our gear. Yes, sir.
translation.fr: - On décharge le matos. - Oui, monsieur.

translation.en: - Linen closet? - Down the hall. Just right at the end there.
translation.fr: Le placard à linge ? Dans le couloir, tout au bout.

translation.en: Kill all the surveillance cameras in this room.
translation.fr: Coupe les caméras dans cette pièce.

translation.en: My name is Daniel Kiefer.
We were at the Farm together.
Technically, you were a year ahead.
translation.fr: Tu étais dans la promotion précédente.

translation.en: I'm here to make you aware of your rights.
translation.fr: Je dois t'informer de tes droits.

translation.en: You're being held under a national security directive...
which means you have none, but you know that.
translation.fr: Il s'agit de sécurité nationale, donc tu n'en as aucun.

translation.en: Towels. You need 600s.
translation.fr: Les serviettes. Il faut des 600, celles-ci...

translation.en: Those are... 350, 375 gram weight.
translation.fr: Les serviettes. Il faut des 600, celles-ci... elles font peut-être 350, 375 grammes.

translation.en: You're gonna need 600s.
[ Kiefer ] I want to know the reasons for you being in Cape Town.
translation.fr: Je veux connaître la raison de ta présence au Cap.

translation.en: I want you to name your resources,
translation.fr: Donne-moi le nom de tes sources,

translation.en: contacts, assets, everybody you've done business with, traded intel with,
translation.fr: de tes contacts, de tes agents, de tous ceux avec qui tu as traité,

translation.en: sold secrets to in the nine years since you betrayed your country.
translation.fr: à qui tu as vendu des secrets depuis que tu trahis ton pays.

translation.en: Absolutely. Anything you want, Daniel.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Tout ce que tu voudras.

translation.en: Khalid Sheikh Mohammed lasted 20 seconds.
translation.fr: Khaled Cheikh Mohammed a tenu 20 secondes.

translation.en: They had 600s.
Is this legal?
[ Kiefer ] Bring him down.
Bring him up.
How long was that? [ Panting ]
All right. Take him down.
Bring him up!
Get me a knife.
Miller.
Get in there with Frost.
- Sir, all the security cameras are down. - Reboot.
I wanna see what's out there. Copy that.
translation.fr: - Rallume-les. Je veux voir qui c'est. - Compris.

translation.en: [ Loud Clang ] Let's go, boys!
Let's go! Move!
Velez, take this corner.
Ericksson, get the back elevator.
Pope, what do you got?
Sir, I see approximately 12 heavily armed men in perimeter two.
translation.fr: Je vois environ 12 hommes lourdement armés dans la zone 2.

translation.en: Two-by-two. Perimeter two.
Greer! Sir!
- [ Kiefer ] Ericksson! - Yes, sir!
[ Kiefer ] Velez!
I'm good!
Let's go, fellas.
- [ Greer ] Incoming! - [ Kiefer ] Grenade! Oh, God!
- [ Groans ] - Greer!
[ Kiefer ] Start working back!
Velez, three-round bursts!
Velez, where's Greer? He's over there, sir.
translation.fr: Valez, où est Greer ? Il est blessé.

translation.en: Go, son.
This ain't a test. This is the real thing.
translation.fr: C'est pas une simulation, c'est en vrai.

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
You don't wanna try me.
[ Kiefer ] Magazine! Let's go.
Velez! Stay there!
Listen to me! Stay there!
[ Machine Gun Fire ] Miller!
Hey! Get in here!
Hey. Take these. Go watch him.
They're here for me, but they want me alive. You, they'll kill.
translation.fr: Ils me veulent vivant mais toi, ils te tueront.

translation.en: You got one in the chamber?
It's okay. I remember my first posting.
translation.fr: Ça va aller. Je me rappelle mon premier poste, à Rio.

translation.en: Rio de Janeiro. House like this.
translation.fr: Je me rappelle mon premier poste, à Rio. Une maison comme ça.

translation.en: Beautiful women. Not one single visitor. But I remember rule number one.
translation.fr: Des femmes superbes et pas une visite, mais je connais la règle:

translation.en: You are responsible for your houseguest. I'm your houseguest.
translation.fr: tu es responsable de ton invité. Je suis ton invité.

translation.en: The clock is ticking. They gave you the keys.
translation.fr: L'heure tourne. Ils t'ont donné les clés.

translation.en: Do your duty, son.
Shut up. Let me think.
You wanna be the guy that lost Tobin Frost?
Where's Frost?
We're leaving.
Where is he?
Psst. Vargas.
8:17 AM, FRIDAY
Stay here! Stay here! Wait!
Don't move!
[ Chattering, Screaming ] [ Weston ] Go!
Get in the trunk.
You're serious? Yeah. Get in.
- The trunk? - Get in the trunk, now!
[ Line Ringing ] [ Man ] Ops Center.
- Echo Three Victor Echo Nine. - Go ahead.
This is Weston. Seven-R's been hit. Everyone's dead.
translation.fr: La 7-R a été attaquée, ils sont tous morts.

translation.en: I need you to repeat that, please. Say again.
Kiefer, his team, everyone, they're all dead.
translation.fr: Kiefer et son équipe sont morts. Patientez.

translation.en: - Transferring. - [ Line Ringing ]
- [ Richards ] It's the house. - [ Man ] Off-line. Protocol two.
Linklater. This is Weston.
The safe house has been breached.
What's your location?
Um, I'm eastbound on Albert Road. I'm just passing Woodstock.
translation.fr: Je vais vers l'est sur Albert Road. Je passe devant Woodstock.

translation.en: I want eyes on this. Real-time sat feed.
[ Linklater ] And what's the location of the guest?
[ Weston ] We escaped.
- Clarify. Do you have the guest? - Yes! We escaped!
translation.fr: Précisez, avez-vous l'invité ? Oui, on s'est enfuis !

translation.en: Look, I can make it to the consulate.
There's no chance for S.D.R. I think I might have picked up a tail.
translation.fr: mais je crois que je suis suivi.

translation.en: We can't have a gun battle in front of the consulate.
Diplomatic catastrophe.
Where's that satellite feed?
Denied by National Recon. War theater use only.
translation.fr: Accessible uniquement en temps de guerre.

translation.en: Buy us some time.
Do not go to the consulate.
Follow protocol Alpha Zero.
Secure the guest and stay off the grid.
Reconnect at 1800 hours.
I repeat: Stay off the grid.
Copy. Copy. Copy.
All right. Cape Town police have responded to the house.
translation.fr: La police du Cap est dans la planque.

translation.en: - Confirmed. - [ Linklater ] I want the site secured.
translation.fr: - Confirmation. - Sécurisez le site. - Il est question de 9 morts. - Minimisez.

translation.en: - [ Richards ] I'm hearing nine dead. - Initiating damage control.
translation.fr: - Il est question de 9 morts. - Minimisez.

translation.en: [ Man ] I'm on it. Reaching out to N.I.A. now.
The locals are gonna have that house locked off.
translation.fr: La police locale va boucler l'antenne.

translation.en: Check all the traffic cameras, police reports.
translation.fr: Vérifiez la vidéosurveillance de la circulation.

translation.en: Find out why Frost wanted to go into that consulate to begin with...
translation.fr: Trouvez pourquoi Frost s'est rendu au consulat

translation.en: and who in the hell else might be after him.
We need to get Weston and Frost out of South Africa.
translation.fr: Il faut sortir Weston et Frost du pays.

translation.en: Do we have any tactical teams? Anything in play?
translation.fr: On a une équipe tactique ? Un plan jouable ?

translation.en: Yeah, I have assets in Egypt, but they're in deep.
If I pull them out, that would compromise two years' worth of work.
translation.fr: mais si je les sors, je ruine leur couverture.

translation.en: I can scramble a team from Europe or Asia, but it's gonna take at least 18 hours.
translation.fr: Je peux monter une équipe, ça prendra au moins 18h.

translation.en: At this point, Weston is all we got.
translation.fr: Pour l'instant, on n'a que Weston.

translation.en: I need to find out who this Matt Weston is right now.
translation.fr: Je veux savoir qui est ce Matt Weston, immédiatement.

translation.en: [ Woman ] Matthew James Weston.
Born 2/24/82... to Terry and Madeline Weston, Port Washington, New York.
translation.fr: né le 24 février 82 de Terry et Madeline, à Port Washington, New York.

translation.en: An assault arrest one month after both parents and a younger sister...
translation.fr: Arrêté pour agression après que sa famille

translation.en: were killed in a traffic accident...
translation.fr: a été tuée dans un accident,

translation.en: in which his father's blood alcohol was twice the legal limit.
translation.fr: le taux d'alcoolémie du père était 2 fois trop élevé.

translation.en: Yale. Degree in economics. Recruited out of Yale Law.
translation.fr: Yale, diplôme d'économie, recruté après son droit à Yale.

translation.en: High marks in analytical and linguistics at the Farm,
translation.fr: Très bien noté en analytique et linguistique à la "ferme",

translation.en: excellent in tradecraft skills.
His girlfriend, Ana Moreau, is a French national.
translation.fr: Sa petite amie, Ana Moreau, est française.

translation.en: Out. Get out. He reported them as having "close and continuing contact"
translation.fr: Il qualifie leur contact de "proche et continu."

translation.en: She's a second-year resident in the oncology department at Groote Schuur.
Get in that car.
translation.fr: à Groote Schuur. Elle a pris un poste à l'Hôtel-Dieu à Paris,

translation.en: She accepted a position with Hôtel-Dieu Hospital in Paris. Starts in two weeks.
translation.fr: Elle a pris un poste à l'Hôtel-Dieu à Paris, elle commence dans 2 semaines.

translation.en: No known political affiliations. She's clean.
translation.fr: Pas de lien politique. Elle est clean.

translation.en: I want you to post a car outside their apartment. Use back channels.
translation.fr: Mettez une voiture devant chez eux, officieusement.

translation.en: And get N.S.A. to cross-check their telephone records and their e-mails, please.
translation.fr: Demandez à la N.S.A. d'éplucher leurs appels et leurs emails.

translation.en: 1:13 PM, FRIDAY
You know, it'd be easier if I knew where we were going.
translation.fr: - Ça irait mieux si je savais où on va. - Roulez, c'est tout.

translation.en: You just drive, all right? Just drive. Middle lane.
translation.fr: - Ça irait mieux si je savais où on va. - Roulez, c'est tout. Sur la voie du milieu.

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing? Middle lane.
translation.fr: Vous allez où, là ? Au milieu.

translation.en: - Just drive around. - All right. I'm driving.
translation.fr: - Roulez, c'est tout. - D'accord, je roule.

translation.en: Nice to know who you're talking to. What's your name?
You crushed my windpipe. Well, you locked me in the trunk.
translation.fr: - Vous m'avez étranglé. - Tu m'as enfermé dans le coffre.

translation.en: Come on. You're not N.O.C.
You're here under your real name. What is it?
Weston, Matt. Oh, all right.
How long you been a safe house keeper?
Twelve months. Happy birthday.
Cape Town, that's low-level detail.
translation.fr: Le Cap, c'est un site mineur,

translation.en: You should've been out of here by now.
Maybe I requested the assignment.
translation.fr: Peut-être que j'ai demandé à venir.

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Or maybe Langley doesn't trust you with anything else.
translation.fr: Peut-être que Langley veut pas te donner mieux.

translation.en: So, what's your plan?
Oh, let me guess. Follow protocol.
Protocol states that if your house is crashed,
you do an S.D.R. to make sure no one's following you,
translation.fr: on s'assure de ne pas être suivi,

translation.en: activate your G.P.S. in your go bag, select another safe house.
translation.fr: on active le G.P.S. du pack de repli et on trouve une autre planque.

translation.en: You think I'm gonna let you just take me in?
translation.fr: Tu crois que je me laisserai faire ?

translation.en: I think you need to shut up. [ Chuckles ]
translation.fr: Je crois que vous devriez vous taire.

translation.en: I think you need to consider how your house was attacked in the first place.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'il faut te demander comment l'antenne a été attaquée. Tu y as pensé ?

translation.en: Have you done that, Matt?
translation.fr: comment l'antenne a été attaquée. Tu y as pensé ?

translation.en: They followed Kiefer. They followed him from the consulate.
translation.fr: Ils ont suivi Kiefer depuis le consulat.

translation.en: And that's how they found the safe house. You don't really believe that.
translation.fr: Ils ont suivi Kiefer depuis le consulat. Tu n'y crois pas toi-même.

translation.en: How did they know I was near the consulate in the first place?
translation.fr: Comment ils ont su que j'étais au consulat ?

translation.en: But I like this, you know-- you and me figuring shit out.
translation.fr: Ça me plaît. Toi et moi, on essaie de piger...

translation.en: Like, uh, the Hardy Boys.
translation.fr: Toi et moi, on essaie de piger... Le Club des 2 !

translation.en: That house was a secure location.
Whoever crashed it didn't stop by a gas station...
translation.fr: Ils ne sont pas allés à la station-service

translation.en: and ask for directions to the nearest safe house.
translation.fr: pour demander la planque du coin.

translation.en: They were invited. Someone told them, Matthew. Think about it.
translation.fr: Ils ont été invités. On les a prévenus. Penses-y.

translation.en: Someone you know. So you better ask yourself: Can you trust your landlord?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un que tu connais. Tu peux te fier à ton proprio ?

translation.en: Go ahead. You're not gonna get in my head. I already am in your head.
translation.fr: - Vous entrerez pas dans ma tête. - Je suis déjà dans ta tête.

translation.en: They're gonna isolate you, Matt. They're gonna be real nice to you at first.
translation.fr: Ils vont t'isoler. Ils vont être très sympas avec toi et ils vont te dire:

translation.en: They're gonna put their arm around you...
translation.fr: Ils vont être très sympas avec toi et ils vont te dire:

translation.en: and tell you things like, "You did a decent job, son.
translation.fr: Ils vont être très sympas avec toi et ils vont te dire: "Beau boulot, fiston. On prend le relais." Là, tu sais que t'es baisé.

translation.en: We'll take it from here." That's when you know you're screwed.
translation.fr: "Beau boulot, fiston. On prend le relais." Là, tu sais que t'es baisé.

translation.en: Forget about me. They're gonna focus on you. They're gonna try and make a connection between you and I,
translation.fr: Ils vont se concentrer sur toi pour trouver un lien entre nous.

translation.en: so that if this all goes wrong,
they'll have something to fall back on in their little Senate hearings.
translation.fr: ils auront une excuse à servir pendant leur audience au Sénat.

translation.en: I'm not your only enemy tonight.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas ton seul ennemi.

translation.en: [ Whitford ] So it's someone in-house.
It's the only way this thing could've happened.
We were completely buttoned up.
I want a list of everyone who knew about this.
translation.fr: Faites une liste de ceux qui savent,

translation.en: Backgrounds, affiliations, particularly any connections with Frost.
translation.fr: avec milieux, affiliations et surtout, leurs liens avec Frost.

translation.en: Every movement, right up until this operation.
translation.fr: Tous leurs gestes jusqu'à cette opération.

translation.en: Your extraction team, how long had they been together?
translation.fr: Votre équipe était formée depuis quand ?

translation.en: My team had been together six months. Why?
Well, I'm just trying to get my head around this.
That'll do. Thank you.
STANDARD HOTEL PAROW, WESTERN CAPE
Baby, where are you?
I'm all right. I'm okay. I'm okay.
translation.fr: Je vais bien, ça va. Ça va.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't call you back. I saw your missed calls.
translation.fr: Désolé de ne pas t'avoir rappelée,

translation.en: You must be worried sick. Is everything okay?
translation.fr: tu devais être inquiète. Tout va bien ?

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good. Listen. Um--
This sounds so crazy.
We had some threats against the clinic last night,
translation.fr: La clinique a été menacée hier soir.

translation.en: so Parker and I, we stayed all night trying to get to the bottom of it. And, uh-- And, uh--
translation.fr: Parker et moi, on est restés pour démêler l'affaire.

translation.en: I'm sorry that I didn't call you back. I should have right away.
I was so worried. I know.
Can you do me a favor? Can you go over to the window for a second?
translation.fr: Tu peux me rendre un service ? Va à la fenêtre.

translation.en: Why?
Can you just take a-- Just take a quick look out the window. I want you to see if there's anyone out there. Any, uh--
translation.fr: Jette un coup d'œil dehors, dis-moi s'il y a quelqu'un.

translation.en: Are there any cars that don't belong, anything?
Anyone hanging around out front?
There's a police car.
translation.fr: Il y a une voiture de police.

translation.en: What's going on? I'm sorry about this.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui se passe ? Je suis désolé pour tout ça,

translation.en: I know this is a lot,
translation.fr: je sais que ça fait beaucoup,

translation.en: but they felt like it would be best if we didn't go home as a precaution.
translation.fr: mais on n'est pas rentrés chez nous par précaution.

translation.en: I agree with them. There's nothing to worry about, but I agree with them.
translation.fr: mais on n'est pas rentrés chez nous par précaution. Tout va bien, mais ça vaut mieux.

translation.en: I think you should just go to Dena's for a little while, just for a few hours.
translation.fr: Tu devrais aller un peu chez Dena,

translation.en: I'll call you in a little bit, and we'll, you know-- we'll--
we'll get together, okay?
Okay, I'll go.
[ Weston ] Okay. All right. I love you. I'll talk to you soon, all right? Don't worry, okay?
translation.fr: Je t'aime. Je te rappelle. Ne t'en fais pas.

translation.en: 5:23 PM, FRIDAY [ Water Running ]
She know what you do for a living?
The girl on the phone. It was a girl, wasn't it?
translation.fr: La fille au téléphone... C'était une fille ?

translation.en: Maybe it was a guy, I don't know.
translation.fr: C'était peut-être un mec, je sais pas.

translation.en: I don't judge.
You can't expect to have a real relationship in our line of work, Matthew.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas avoir une vraie relation, dans ce métier.

translation.en: Don't worry. She's not gonna leave you.
See, what happens is you try to protect her with lies,
translation.fr: En fait, tu essaies de la protéger

translation.en: and then it starts to add up.
translation.fr: en mentant et tout se met en place.

translation.en: At the safe house, you said that they'd kill me to get to you.
- After a while, even the truth starts to sound like a lie. - Why?
translation.fr: Même la vérité finit par ressembler au mensonge.

translation.en: You have something. You got something that they want.
translation.fr: Vous avez quelque chose qu'ils veulent.

translation.en: What is it? A local girl?
translation.fr: Vous avez quelque chose qu'ils veulent. - Elle est d'ici ? - Oubliez-la.

translation.en: - Don't worry about her. - Oh, it is a girl.
You'll keep covering your tracks.
She'll keep believing, because she wants to, because she needs to.
translation.fr: elle te croira parce qu'elle le veut, elle en a besoin.

translation.en: That's why we exist, you and me. That's our job.
translation.fr: C'est notre raison d'exister, notre travail.

translation.en: To take advantage of that--
people's desire to believe.
translation.fr: les gens ont besoin de croire,

translation.en: To trust.
She's not gonna leave you, Matthew.
You're gonna leave her.
I'm not you.
[ Man ] Correct, sir. We verified it.
He's your boy. You take it.
[ Man ] Everybody stand by.
- [ Ringing Stops ] - Matty, it's me.
How you holding up?
I'm all right.
Matt, we can't get another team in for at least 12 hours.
translation.fr: On n'aura pas d'équipe avant 12 heures.

translation.en: Sorry.
We've cleared a new safe house for you outside the city.
translation.fr: On a une autre planque en dehors de la ville.

translation.en: There's a go bag located at locker number 256,
translation.fr: Il y a un pack de repli dans le casier numéro 256 au stade Greenpoint.

translation.en: Green Point Stadium, Metrorail station.
The combination: 2-5-1-22.
Now, the bag's got a G.P.S. in it.
translation.fr: Il y a un G.P.S. dans le sac,

translation.en: It'll direct you to the safe house.
translation.fr: il te guidera à la maison.

translation.en: But you gotta be careful. It's an active location.
translation.fr: Fais attention, il y a du passage là-bas.

translation.en: So approach with caution.
translation.fr: Reste sur tes gardes en arrivant.

translation.en: Do you know how they found Frost? You know who led them to us?
translation.fr: Comment ils ont retrouvé Frost ? Qui leur a dit ?

translation.en: We're working on that.
We're counting on you, Matt.
Get Frost to that safe house and you can write your own ticket.
translation.fr: Amène Frost et tu pourras choisir ton poste.

translation.en: I will.
I will.
Left at the light.
To the stadium?
[ Weston ] Hey, scarf. How much for the scarf?
[ Man ] Fifty rand, sir.
Cuff your hands together. Together?
Out.
Are you sure you don't wanna just walk away from this?
Can't do that. Yes, you can. You should.
translation.fr: - Je peux pas. - Mais si, tu peux. Tu devrais.

translation.en: Move.
Go. Across the street.
Going to the game. I like games.
Metrorail, straight ahead. Straight ahead.
Right over there.
Let's go.
- Help! Help! Help! He's trying to kidnap me! - [ Weston ] Whoa, whoa, whoa!
- He's trying to kidnap me! Help! Help! - [ Shouting In Afrikaans ]
- He's got a gun! - I'm undercover. I'm a policeman.
[ Speaking Afrikaans ] Help!
He's got a gun! He's got a gun right there!
I'm undercover. No. I'm undercover.
- I'm undercover. - If you calm down, sir. Everybody calm down!
translation.fr: Du calme ! Tout le monde se calme !

translation.en: Drop the gun!
[ Groans ] Get down! Get down!
I arrested that man. He's a murderer.
translation.fr: J'ai arrêté cet homme, c'est un assassin.

translation.en: All right. I'm just-- I'm an American citizen. I don't know what he-- what he-- what he--
translation.fr: Je suis américain. Je ne sais pas ce...

translation.en: You don't understand. that man is extremely dangerous.
translation.fr: Vous ne comprenez pas, cet homme est très dangereux.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey! I'm a police officer. I'm from America.
translation.fr: Je suis un policier américain, il s'appelle Tobin Frost.

translation.en: I arrested this man. His name is Tobin Frost. Where did you take him?
translation.fr: Je suis un policier américain, il s'appelle Tobin Frost. Où est-il ?

translation.en: He's in the infirmary.
There! There! There! Is that it? Top left!
Second screen from the top. Look. Look. The infirmary.
translation.fr: A gauche, deuxième en partant du haut. Regardez, l'infirmerie !

translation.en: All right. Go back.
Third-tier infirmary now! Move!
Third-tier infirmary. Go now!
You see?
[ Gun Cocks ] Don't move.
Suspect now spotted,
on the southwest upper deck.
Alert on lower concourse.
Suspect sighted passing yellow block 228.
translation.fr: Alerte sur le parvis inférieur. Suspect signalé devant le bloc jaune 228.

translation.en: - Get out of the way! - Stop!
No! Stop!
Medic!
Drop the gun.
Drop it.
I'm responsible for you.
You're responsible for yourself.
Get on your knees.
You gonna kill me?
I only kill professionals.
translation.fr: Je ne tue que les pros.

translation.en: 7:53 PM, FRIDAY [ Man On Police Radio ] Height, approximately six fee.
Anglo, wearing a stadium security jacket.
translation.fr: 19h53 VENDREDI il a un blouson du service de sécurité.

translation.en: The suspect was last seen entering Green Point Stadium Metrorail, stadium concourse.
translation.fr: Le suspect a été signalé à l'entrée du métro, sur le parvis du stade.

translation.en: Sir, we have a thread on what Frost might be doing in Cape Town.
translation.fr: Nous avons une piste concernant Frost.

translation.en: - Uh, can you-- Can you bring up-- - Yeah.
Alec Wade. Fifteen-year NOC at MI6.
translation.fr: Alec Wade. 15 ans sous couverture pour le M.I.6.

translation.en: Sabotage, counter-ambush, counter-I.E.D. tactics,
until he blew up an op in Lisbon four years ago and was put on a desk, pushing papers.
translation.fr: a planté une opération et a été relégué dans un bureau.

translation.en: Cape Town police found him shot through the head.
High-powered rifle. Fourteen blocks from the consulate.
translation.fr: par un fusil longue portée, à 14 rues du consulat.

translation.en: Witnesses placed someone fitting Frost's description... in the car at the time of the shooting.
translation.fr: Un homme ressemblant à Frost a été vu dans sa voiture.

translation.en: And we think what? That they were working together?
Well, they ran joint operations in Hamburg, mid-'80s.
translation.fr: Ils ont mené des opérations à Hambourg.

translation.en: Frost's last sighting was in Hamburg, 2011.
translation.fr: Ils ont mené des opérations à Hambourg. Frost a été signalé à Hambourg en 2011.

translation.en: And what are the Brits saying about Wade?
Hmm, officially they're saying nothing.
Unofficially?
translation.fr: Et officieusement ? Ils ont enquêté sur lui, il aurait vendu des informations.

translation.en: He's been the subject of a five-month internal investigation. They think he's been trading intel. Hmm.
translation.fr: Ils ont enquêté sur lui, il aurait vendu des informations.

translation.en: So what the hell did Wade leak to Frost...
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que Wade a pu vendre à Frost

translation.en: that was so important it was worth killing six of our men?
translation.fr: qui valait qu'on tue 6 de nos hommes ?

translation.en: I want more details from MI6.
translation.fr: Il me faut plus de détails du M.I.6.

translation.en: - Call in every chit you got. - Yes, sir.
And, David, I want an internal investigation of Daniel Kiefer and his team.
translation.fr: David, lancez une enquête interne sur Daniel Kiefer et son équipe.

translation.en: - I've got Weston calling in for David Barlow. - [ Man ] Everyone, stand by.
translation.fr: Weston veut parler à David Barlow.

translation.en: [ Weston On Phone ] I lost him. [ Barlow ] Frost?
[ Weston ] Yeah, he's gone.
After I picked up the G.P.S., he created a diversion, took out a couple of cops at the stadium.
translation.fr: Il a fait diversion et il a descendu 2 flics au stade.

translation.en: - [ Barlow ] Any idea where's he's headed? - Not exactly, but I will.
translation.fr: Une idée de sa destination ? Je trouverai.

translation.en: This is Linklater. You said he took out two cops?
translation.fr: Ici Linklater. Il a tué 2 flics ?

translation.en: Matt, you're on speaker.
Yes, ma'am. At the Green Point Stadium.
The suspect is being described as a white male of medium build--
translation.fr: Le suspect est un homme blanc...

translation.en: Stadium police is reporting you shot a cop.
translation.fr: D'après la police, vous avez tiré.

translation.en: [ Weston ] I returned fire in self-defense.
Look. The fact of the matter is Frost is on the loose.
translation.fr: Ecoutez, Frost est dans la nature.

translation.en: I've spent the last 14 hours with him.
He might have said or done something that could lead me to him.
translation.fr: il a peut-être laissé échapper un indice.

translation.en: You are to stand down, proceed to the consulate,
translation.fr: Vous allez vous retirer, vous rendre au consulat

translation.en: and present yourself for exfil and debrief. Acknowledge.
By the time I'm debriefed, Frost will be gone.
translation.fr: En attendant, Frost se fait la belle.

translation.en: I've spent 12 months researching every square inch of this town.
translation.fr: J'ai passé 12 mois à étudier cette ville.

translation.en: I will find Frost, and I'll deliver him.
translation.fr: Je trouverai Frost et je le livrerai.

translation.en: Weston, this is Harlan Whitford, son.
translation.fr: et je le livrerai. Ici Harlan Whitford, fiston.

translation.en: Now you've done a fine job, but we'll take it from here.
translation.fr: C'est du beau boulot, on prend le relais.

translation.en: Understood.
Sir, I respectfully request that that exchange not make it onto his files.
translation.fr: Peut-on effacer cet échange de son dossier ?

translation.en: He's either incompetent, or he's working with somebody else.
translation.fr: Il est incompétent ou il nous double.

translation.en: Do not make this about Weston.
David-- It was your guys that lost Frost. It was your team folded at the safe house.
translation.fr: Vos gars ont perdu Frost et foiré à l'antenne.

translation.en: I want both of you on an airplane to Cape Town.
translation.fr: Prenez l'avion pour Le Cap tous les deux.

translation.en: Frost is trying to get out of the country.
Go find his ass.
8:37 PM, FRIDAY
[ Whispers ] There you go, baby.
One ticket to Jo'burg.
[ Woman On TV ] Police have detained American N.G.O. worker Matthew Weston..
translation.fr: La police suspecte un employé d'une O.N.G., Matthew Weston, dans la fusillade.

translation.en: as a possible suspect in the shooting.
Weston had been detained earlier today,
translation.fr: Weston a été arrêté dans la journée,

translation.en: but had managed to escape while being questioned by police--
translation.fr: mais il a pu s'enfuir pendant son interrogatoire.

translation.en: The suspect has been described as a white male of medium build,
translation.fr: Le suspect est un homme blanc, de taille moyenne,

translation.en: possibly wearing a stadium security outfit.
translation.fr: il porte peut-être un blouson de la sécurité...

translation.en: Baby.
Are you all right?
I lied to you.
About everything. The N.G.O., Parker,
my job,
my family.
So who do you work for?
The government.
C.I.A.
No, no. I don't--
I don't do anything. I sit-- I--
translation.fr: Je fais rien, je reste dans un appartement et je réponds au téléphone.

translation.en: I sit around in an apartment all day. I answer the phone.
translation.fr: je reste dans un appartement et je réponds au téléphone.

translation.en: I need you to leave.
I need you to do that for me. Okay?
translation.fr: Il faut que tu le fasses pour moi.

translation.en: Here.
This is a ticket to Jo'burg.
When you get there, you go straight to the airport. There's a 6:00 a.m. flight to Paris.
translation.fr: Va direct à l'aéroport, il y a un vol pour Paris.

translation.en: Take this.
You take this. If anyone stops you--
If anyone stops you-- If anybody stops you--
Who do you think I am?
Stop! Stop! Fuck you!
Hey. Stop.
We broke up a week ago. You haven't seen me since, okay?
translation.fr: On a rompu il y a une semaine, tu m'as pas revu.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Just leave.
Please?
- Do you love me? - Very much.
Go.
[ Woman On P.A. ] Attention, all passengers, platform 20 for Langa Township,
translation.fr: Le train pour le township de Langa partira du quai 20

translation.en: departing in five minutes.
Langa Township, departing in five minutes.
Sir, someone just logged into our system...
using Weston's password, accessing his stored files.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un s'est connecté au système avec le mot de passe de Weston.

translation.en: It's him. What the hell's he doing?
I want to see what he's looking at.
[ Richards ] He's pulled an old report on surveillance targets...
living in the Langa Township area.
It's a profile of Carlos Villar, a Nicaraguan national.
translation.fr: C'est le profil de Carlos Villar, un Nicaraguayen.

translation.en: He's a known document forger.
- [ Whitford ] Get me a copy of Weston's report. - [ Richards ] Yes, sir.
Oh, shit. Logged off, sir. He's gone.
An Internet café on Long Street.
LANGA TOWNSHIP CAPE TOWN
- The black Dorian Gray. - That's right.
How you doing, brother? [ Chuckles ]
Come in. Yes, sir.
Illana.
[ Illana ] Hi. We have a guest.
Illana. Good to meet you. Joseph. My daughter.
How are you? Hello.
My son-in-law.
- [ Chuckles ] - [ Illana ] May I offer you some tea?
Uh, no. We're going upstairs.
I remembered.
You even let it breathe.
"Too long a sacrifice can make a stone of the heart.
translation.fr: "Un trop long sacrifice Peut changer en pierre le cœur

translation.en: O when may it suffice?
That is heaven's part."
In the old days, a cheap bottle of Flor de Caña kept us happy all night.
translation.fr: A l'époque, on se contentait d'une bouteille de Flor de Caña.

translation.en: Mmm. Tastes change.
People change.
People don't change.
We grow old.
And some of us adapt...
and learn how to enjoy simple pleasures of life,
translation.fr: et apprennent à savourer les plaisirs simples,

translation.en: like a family, a home.
translation.fr: comme d'avoir une famille, un foyer.

translation.en: And for you,
what's in that glass right now, for you,
is as good as it's ever gonna be.
translation.fr: il n'y a pas mieux au monde.

translation.en: One day you'll understand...
you got more past than future.
translation.fr: que tu as plus de passé que d'avenir.

translation.en: You'll learn.
What is this? An intervention?
I thought you were dead.
So, what brings you to my home in the middle of the night after all these years?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui t'amène ici en pleine nuit après tant d'années ?

translation.en: Uh-huh? We're going.
Okay, be careful. Okay, Papa.
What are you gonna do with this?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu vas en faire ?

translation.en: Gonna make some money.
Let me borrow your glasses.
That's it. Listen.
I'm gonna need a new passport,
translation.fr: Il me faut un nouveau passeport,

translation.en: photo I.D., driver's license, the whole shebang.
Can you do that for me?
translation.fr: la totale. Tu peux me les faire ?

translation.en: You sure?
Weston never showed at the consulate.
translation.fr: Weston n'est pas allé au consulat

translation.en: And he was just accessing our secure server,
translation.fr: et il a consulté notre serveur

translation.en: searching for someone to create an alias package.
He's trying to leave the country.
translation.fr: Il essaie de quitter le pays.

translation.en: Or he's going after Frost.
[ Linklater ] Look at what happened at the soccer stadium.
translation.fr: Vous avez vu ce qui s'est passé au stade.

translation.en: This guy let Frost escape.
I think Weston's turned.
I know this boy.
He's been looking for a chance to prove himself.
translation.fr: Il veut surtout faire ses preuves,

translation.en: He's trying to bring in Frost.
translation.fr: il va essayer de ramener Frost.

translation.en: Come on, David. You're not seeing the evidence.
translation.fr: Allons, David... Vous refusez de voir l'évidence.

translation.en: [ Clears Throat ] Not my best work,
but given the pressure of time, it's passable.
translation.fr: comme le temps presse, c'est pas mal.

translation.en: It's good. I'll wire you the money as soon as I get out of town.
translation.fr: Je te ferai un virement après mon départ.

translation.en: Tobin, don't do this.
It's different.
You don't need the trouble. You don't need the money.
translation.fr: T'as pas besoin de ça ni de cet argent.

translation.en: - You can give it-- - [ Gunshot ]
Vete. Go.
- He's on the roof! - [ Machine Gun Fire ]
Get in the car!
They think they can come at me like this.
translation.fr: Ils croient qu'ils m'auront comme ça ?

translation.en: Have to do a whole lot better than that.
Shit!
Yeah, Matt, how'd you find me?
It wasn't that hard.
Let's go.
Wait, wait, wait, wait.
Who do you work for?
Who sent you?
[ Man Groaning ] Who?
Vargas.
Who's Vargas? Who's Vargas?
You wanna die? Huh?
Who's Vargas? [ Gun Cocks ]
C.I.A.
6:17 AM, SATURDAY Report?
There was a shoot-out in the Langa Township.
translation.fr: Il y a eu une fusillade à Langa.

translation.en: Two crime scenes. One at the residence of Carlos Villar.
translation.fr: 2 scènes de crime : dans la maison de Carlos Villar,

translation.en: He's a document forger. The other, a nearby tenement.
translation.fr: un faussaire, et dans un bâtiment proche.

translation.en: And where was Frost last seen? Tenement.
translation.fr: - Frost a été vu ? - Dans le bâtiment.

translation.en: Have fun at Villar's.
We'll meet up later.
You were right about Ana.
That's her name.
[ Frost ] Sorry to hear that.
Most case officers get married three, four times.
translation.fr: Les officiers traitants se marient souvent 3 ou 4 fois.

translation.en: You?
Once.
You're falling apart over here.
Don't kill innocent people, Matthew.
What?
Air traffic controller. Tiny airstrip in Bermuda.
translation.fr: Un contrôleur aérien, un petit aérodrome aux Bermudes.

translation.en: George Edwart Cox. I remember that name.
translation.fr: George Edwart Cox, je me souviens de son nom.

translation.en: Edwart, with a "T."
My inside officer said, uh,
he was organizing arms shipments,
translation.fr: Mon officier infiltré m'avait dit... qu'il transportait des armes, mais c'était juste un contrôleur.

translation.en: but he was just an air traffic controller. He was just a guy.
translation.fr: qu'il transportait des armes, mais c'était juste un contrôleur.

translation.en: I put a bullet in his skull.
translation.fr: Je lui ai mis une balle dans le crâne.

translation.en: Black ops came in, they replaced him with one of their own,
translation.fr: Les forces spéciales sont venues, ils l'ont remplacé

translation.en: crashed a Gulfstream in the ocean that night.
translation.fr: et ils ont crashé un avion dans l'océan.

translation.en: Thing was, the family that was on the plane--
translation.fr: Il y avait une famille dans cet avion...

translation.en: husband-- he was a whistle-blower.
translation.fr: Le mari allait révéler des choses.

translation.en: Whole thing was about...
stopping him from testifying about wet works...
translation.fr: l'empêcher de témoigner sur des assassinats,

translation.en: to a congressional hearing.
That's why you left. No.
translation.fr: Vous êtes parti pour ça ? Non.

translation.en: I went back to work the next day like nothing ever happened.
translation.fr: Je suis retourné travailler comme si de rien n'était.

translation.en: You practice anything a long time, you get good at it.
translation.fr: Si on s'entraîne longtemps, on devient bon.

translation.en: You tell a hundred lies a day, it sounds like the truth.
translation.fr: Si on ment 100 fois par jour, ça ressemble à la vérité.

translation.en: Everyone betrays everyone.
translation.fr: Tout le monde trahit tout le monde.

translation.en: That's a shitty excuse.
Yeah, I used to be innocent like you.
Wrap myself up in the flag.
I'm gonna take you in.
Good for you.
- Barlow. - [ Linklater ] So, witnesses identified a pair of men...
translation.fr: Barlow. On a signalé 2 hommes ressemblant à Weston et Frost,

translation.en: fitting Weston and Frost's description leaving this location together.
translation.fr: On a signalé 2 hommes ressemblant à Weston et Frost, quittant cet endroit ensemble.

translation.en: - So he pulled it off. - Weston is aiding and abetting a fugitive.
translation.fr: Il a réussi. Weston aide un fugitif.

translation.en: [ Barlow ] You're wrong.
If he's with Frost, he's taking him to the safe house.
translation.fr: S'il est avec Frost, c'est qu'il l'emmène à la planque.

translation.en: [ Watch Beeps ] That's where we gotta be.
translation.fr: c'est qu'il l'emmène à la planque.

translation.en: Fine. Fine.
Meet me at the crossroads at Old Malmesbury Road.
translation.fr: Rendez-vous à l'intersection sur Old Malmesbury Road.

translation.en: 11:43 AM, SATURDAY [ Gun Cocks ]
Who are you?
You Weston?
Give me the shotgun.
What the hell is this? Who are you?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, ce bordel ? Qui t'es ?

translation.en: I'm Keller. Safe house keeper.
translation.fr: Keller, le gardien de la maison.

translation.en: Authorization index: Bravo Four Seven Oscar Whiskey Six.
Inside. Let's go.
Left.
Slowly.
I don't know who trained you, man, but this sure as hell ain't protocol.
Where's the guest room?
translation.fr: Où est la chambre de l'invité ?

translation.en: Well, that's the thing. We don't really have one.
translation.fr: En fait, on n'en a pas vraiment.

translation.en: In there.
Cuff him.
To the pipe.
Out. Over there.
All right.
Control room.
Whatever you say, man. It's your rodeo.
translation.fr: Comme tu veux, c'est toi le chef.

translation.en: Call it in. Let me hear it.
[ Man ] Landlord. My guest is here.
translation.fr: - Ici le propriétaire. - Mon invité est arrivé.

translation.en: Account? Abaresque Limited.
With a guest? Yeah, package delivered.
Confirmed. Pickup scheduled.
All right. They're on the way.
translation.fr: C'est bon, ils sont en route.

translation.en: Can we at least put the gun down now?
Thanks, Clayton. Bye.
It's a microchip.
What?
That was my guy from MI6. Wade got his hands on a microchip.
translation.fr: J'ai eu un ami du M.I.6. Wade avait une micropuce.

translation.en: And what was on it? Only Wade knew.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'elle contenait ? Seul Wade le savait.

translation.en: But I think it's safe to assume that's why he hooked up with Frost-- to sell it.
translation.fr: J'imagine qu'il a contacté Frost pour la vendre.

translation.en: Let's get moving.
Long day, huh?
Yeah. I can only imagine. With Tobin Frost.
That man's a legend.
I hope you picked up something. I mean, you ain't gonna find a better education.
translation.fr: J'espère que t'as appris des trucs, y a pas plus formateur.

translation.en: You know, this is the most excitement I've seen.
You're the first guest I've had in 10 months.
translation.fr: T'es le premier invité en 10 mois.

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] But you wouldn't know anything about that now, right?
translation.fr: Tu sais pas ce que c'est, toi.

translation.en: You got a city posting.
Yeah, nightlife, beaches,
translation.fr: La ville la nuit, les plages...

translation.en: little ladies running around everywhere.
I'm jealous.
You got coffee?
Yeah, yeah. It's in the cupboard. Where?
Want me to go get it? I got it.
translation.fr: - Je te le sors ? - C'est bon.

translation.en: Why are-- Why are you in Cape Town?
translation.fr: Pourquoi... Pourquoi vous êtes venu au Cap ?

translation.en: You tell me now. Why?
translation.fr: Il faut me le dire, maintenant.

translation.en: What is-- What is it?
Dirt list, laundry list.
Israeli Intelligence, five years ago, compiled blackmail intel.
translation.fr: Les services secrets israéliens ont rassemblé des infos pour un chantage.

translation.en: Corrupt agents, German intelligence, MI6.
translation.fr: Ce sont des agents corrompus allemands, ceux du M.I.6...

translation.en: C.I.A.?
We gotta get away.
We-- We gotta get outta here.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on sorte de là.

translation.en: Ah, shit.
Don't-- Don't, don't, don't.
Don't. No. Don't-- Don't leave me here, please.
Don't-- Don't do it, please. Please.
How you doing?
I'm proud of you.
And what you pulled off.
translation.fr: Fier de ce que tu as accompli.

translation.en: You're gonna make a hell of a case officer.
translation.fr: Tu feras un sacré officier traitant.

translation.en: Where's Frost?
Ah, he's gone.
Place is a wreck.
And blood everywhere.
translation.fr: Il y a du sang partout.

translation.en: Was he injured or--
I guess you know he killed Keller.
translation.fr: Tu dois savoir qu'il a tué Keller.

translation.en: I killed Keller.
Frost killed Keller.
He killed Linklater too.
Did he talk about anything? Any-- Anything he was after?
translation.fr: Il a dit quelque chose ? Sur une chose qu'il cherche

translation.en: Anything he might have had?
File.
A file?
The file that you're on.
translation.fr: Le fichier dans lequel tu es cité.

translation.en: Along with a lot of other people. Important people.
translation.fr: Ainsi qu'un tas d'autres gens. Des gens importants.

translation.en: Listen to me. What would you do...
translation.fr: Ecoute-moi bien. Qu'est-ce que tu ferais

translation.en: if someone is watching your every move--
translation.fr: si on épiait tes moindres gestes,

translation.en: some maybe you're not proud of,
translation.fr: même ceux dont tu n'es pas fier ?

translation.en: and you will have some you're not proud of, believe me--
translation.fr: Il y en aura dont tu ne seras pas fier, crois-moi.

translation.en: and then tries to use it against you?
translation.fr: Et qu'on voulait s'en servir contre toi ?

translation.en: You'd do what you have to do.
You'd do what you have to do.
Where's the file?
Matt, the file. Where is the file?
translation.fr: Matt, le fichier ! Où est le fichier ?

translation.en: You're a dead man.
Yeah. A long time now.
Frost is here.
Let's go.
We got him.
A hell of a job.
You smell that, huh?
That Pinotage is a good grape. Great wine, yeah.
translation.fr: Ça sent le Pinotage. C'est un bon cépage, un bon vin...

translation.en: Local grape, Pinotage. Great--
[ Whispers ] I don't want you losing this one.
translation.fr: Il faut pas que tu perdes ça.

translation.en: This is worth a lot of money.
You-- You're a good boy, Matty.
translation.fr: Pas mal... T'es un mec bien.

translation.en: You know what you are?
I know what you're not.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que t'es pas.

translation.en: You're better than me.
No, it's okay. Just...
be better than me.
You promise me.
Yeah.
Let's-- Let's go.
I just gotta get up. I need to get up.
translation.fr: Il faut que je me lève.

translation.en: [ Grunts ] Stay. Yeah, yeah.
C.I.A HEADQUARTERS LANGLEY, VA
translation.fr: Q.G. DE LA C.I.A. LANGLEY, VIRGINIE

translation.en: That's, uh, exactly as it happened.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: Well, obviously this situation needs to be handled with a certain amount of finesse.
translation.fr: Visiblement, il va falloir gérer cette situation tout en finesse.

translation.en: Has anybody else seen this report? No, sir. Not yet.
translation.fr: - Quelqu'un d'autre a lu ce rapport ? - Non, monsieur. Pas encore.

translation.en: Matt, I'm sure this comes as no surprise,
but parts of this report are gonna have to be altered for national security.
translation.fr: certains passages seront remaniés pour des raisons de sécurité nationale.

translation.en: Which parts, sir? Well,
David Barlow can't be held responsible for what happened to the safe house.
translation.fr: Barlow ne peut pas être responsable de ce qui s'est passé à la planque.

translation.en: We just don't need the scandal.
But, sir, you and I both know that that's just not the truth.
translation.fr: Nous savons que ce n'est pas la vérité.

translation.en: People don't want the truth anymore, Matt.
translation.fr: Les gens ne veulent plus de la vérité, elle est trop désagréable.

translation.en: It's too messy. Keeps them up nights.
translation.fr: Les gens ne veulent plus de la vérité, elle est trop désagréable. Elle les empêche de dormir.

translation.en: I tell you what I am willing to do though.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire ce que je compte faire.

translation.en: I think the Agency has grossly underestimated you,
and I'm recommending you for a senior case officer position.
translation.fr: et je te recommande pour un poste d'officier traitant senior,

translation.en: Provided you still want it.
That's a generous offer, sir.
There's just one thing you need to clarify for me.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin de tes lumières sur un point.

translation.en: Of course.
Frost may have been carrying some vital intel.
translation.fr: Frost avait peut-être des informations cruciales,

translation.en: A file.
I'm not seeing that anywhere in this report.
translation.fr: Il n'en est pas fait mention dans ce rapport.

translation.en: What was on the file, sir?
Something that, quite frankly, could be very damaging to the Agency and to our allies.
translation.fr: Une chose qui pourrait réellement causer des dégâts à l'Agence et chez nos alliés.

translation.en: I don't see why Frost would even mention something like that to me.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas pourquoi Frost m'en aurait parlé.

translation.en: No, I suppose he wouldn't, would he?
translation.fr: Il n'avait aucune raison de le faire.

translation.en: You realize though that if that file did leak,
translation.fr: Tu réalises, si ce fichier était rendu public,

translation.en: what would happen to the person responsible.
That person would be arrested, sir.
He'd be risking everything.
He'd have enemies in every intelligence agency in the world.
translation.fr: Elle aurait des ennemis dans tous les services secrets.

translation.en: In the eyes of the C.I.A., he'd be just like Tobin Frost.
translation.fr: Aux yeux de la C.I.A., elle serait comme Tobin Frost.

translation.en: Frost didn't say anything about a file, sir.
All right, son.
Take a few days off.
We'll get you started next week.
Thank you.
And, uh, think about our conversation, would you?
Will do. I'll take it from here, sir.
translation.fr: C'est promis. Je prends le relais, monsieur.

translation.en: [ Man On TV ] Media outlets received a controversial file from an anonymous source.
The international intelligence community is still reeling...
translation.fr: Tous les services secrets sont ébranlés

translation.en: from the release of so many highly classified documents...
translation.fr: par la diffusion de documents secrets,

translation.en: and the revelations of widespread corruption...
and criminal activity at the C.I.A., the B.N.D.--
translation.fr: et les activités criminelles au sein de la C.I.A.

translation.en: [ Man #2 ] ...is in an uproar over the lack of oversight given to British Intelligence,
translation.fr: Le Parlement critique l'absence de surveillance du M.I.6

translation.en: demanding accountability of the rogue agents.
translation.fr: et exige des précisions sur les agents.

translation.en: Officials at MI6 are fully cooperating--
[ Man #3 ] Chancellor Merkel insists that the B.N.D....
translation.fr: D'après Mme Merkel, les agents corrompus de la B.N.D. sont identifiés

translation.en: has already identified the corrupt agents and contained the intelligence breach.
translation.fr: les agents corrompus de la B.N.D. sont identifiés et la fuite est contenue.

translation.en: She has ensured her international counterparts--
translation.fr: Elle assure... Des mises en examen sont attendues,

translation.en: [ Man #4 ] ...indictments are now expected within the week, and that Congress...
translation.fr: Des mises en examen sont attendues, et le Congrès a demandé au sous-directeur, Harlan Whitford,

translation.en: has demanded that Deputy Director Harlan Whitford...
translation.fr: et le Congrès a demandé au sous-directeur, Harlan Whitford,

translation.en: testify before a Senate subcommittee,
in an effort to determine how many people at the C.I.A. are involved in this...
translation.fr: afin de déterminer combien d'agents de la C.I.A. sont impliqués

translation.en: and just how far up the corruption reaches.
PARIS, FRANCE
